verses.verse: This <S%H2088><s%> is the book <S%H5612><s%> of the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Adam <S%H121><s%>. In the day <S%H3117><s%> that 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> <S%H8800><s%> man <S%H120><s%>, in the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> he him;

Male <S%H2145><s%> and female <S%H5347><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> <S%H8804><s%> he them; and blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them, and called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their name <S%H8034><s%> Adam <S%H120><s%>, in the day <S%H3117><s%> when they were created <S%H1254><s%> <S%H8736><s%>.

And Adam <S%H121><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8686><s%> a son in his own likeness <S%H1823><s%>, after his image <S%H6754><s%>; and called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> SHet <S%H8352><s%>:

And the days <S%H3117><s%> of Adam <S%H121><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he had begotten <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8687><s%> SHet <S%H8352><s%> were eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>: and he begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8686><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>:

And all the days <S%H3117><s%> that Adam <S%H121><s%> lived <S%H2425><s%> <S%H8804><s%> were nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>: and he died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
And SHet <S%H8352><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> an hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Enos <S%H583><s%>:

And SHet <S%H8352><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8687><s%> Enos <S%H583><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8686><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>:

And all the days <S%H3117><s%> of SHet <S%H8352><s%> were nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and twelve <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8147><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>: and he died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
And Enos <S%H583><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> ninety <S%H8673><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Kayinan <S%H7018><s%>:

And Enos <S%H583><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8687><s%> Kayinan <S%H7018><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and fifteen <S%H6240><s%> <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8686><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>:
And all the days <S%H3117><s%> of Enos <S%H583><s%> were nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>: and he died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
And Kayinan <S%H7018><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Mahalaleel <S%H4111><s%>:

And Kayinan <S%H7018><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8687><s%> Mahalaleel <S%H4111><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8686><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>:
And all the days <S%H3117><s%> of Kayinan <S%H7018><s%> were nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>: and he died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
And Mahalaleel <S%H4111><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Yered <S%H3382><s%>:

And Mahalaleel <S%H4111><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8687><s%> Yered <S%H3382><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8686><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>:

And all the days <S%H3117><s%> of Mahalaleel <S%H4111><s%> were eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> ninety <S%H8673><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>: and he died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And Yered <S%H3382><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> an hundred <S%H3967><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and he begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Hanokh <S%H2585><s%>:

And Yered <S%H3382><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8687><s%> Hanokh <S%H2585><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8686><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>:

And all the days <S%H3117><s%> of Yered <S%H3382><s%> were nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>: and he died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
And Hanokh <S%H2585><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Metushelach <S%H4968><s%>:

And Hanokh <S%H2585><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8691><s%> with <S%H854><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8687><s%> <S%H853><s%> Metushelach <S%H4968><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8686><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>:
And all the days <S%H3117><s%> of Hanokh <S%H2585><s%> were three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>:
And Hanokh <S%H2585><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8691><s%> with 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: and he was not; for 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him.

And Metushelach <S%H4968><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> an hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> eighty <S%H8084><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Lamech <S%H3929><s%>:

And Metushelach <S%H4968><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8687><s%> Lamech <S%H3929><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> eighty <S%H8084><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8686><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>:

And all the days <S%H3117><s%> of Metushelach <S%H4968><s%> were nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> and nine <S%H8672><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>: and he died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And Lamech <S%H3929><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> an hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> eighty <S%H8084><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8686><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>:

And he called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Noach <S%H5146><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, This same shall comfort <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8762><s%> us concerning our work <S%H4639><s%> and toil <S%H6093><s%> of our hands <S%H3027><s%>, because <S%H4480><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath cursed <S%H779><s%> <S%H8765><s%>.

And Lamech <S%H3929><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8687><s%> Noach <S%H5146><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> ninety <S%H8673><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8686><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>:

And all the days <S%H3117><s%> of Lamech <S%H3929><s%> were seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>: and he died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And Noach <S%H5146><s%> was five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>: and Noach <S%H5146><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Shem <S%H8035><s%>, Ham <S%H2526><s%>, and Yefet <S%H3315><s%>.
